fields.title: Senior Python Engineer
fields.description:
Purpose of the job:We are transforming the email security landscape with the next-generation Secure Email Cloud powered by predictive AI. Leveraging data science and real-time intelligence from trillions of emails, we provide a suite of products that detect, defend, and deter costly advanced email attacks. We believe strongly in autonomy for our engineering team; in collaboration with the product owners and engineering colleagues, our engineers are empowered to make decisions about every aspect of our architecture and development process. The engineering organization is focused on creating robust, modern micro-services application implemented in Ruby and Python and deployed to AWS.

We are looking for a senior Python engineer, ideally with knowledge in JavaScript. You will be working with a phishing detection module, data aggregation, pagination and other features.MAIN TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

Work, in a collaborative manner, with your product owner and scrum team to scope and prioritize feature requirements and engineering backlog.
Practice secure development methodologies during design, implementation and maintenance of products and services.
Work in close contact with team members and project stakeholders on the client’s site
Take an active role in architectural discussions
EDUCATION, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:MUST HAVE:

4+ years-experience with Python
Experience in building reliable, high-available, distributed architectures
Experience in Microservice architecture and its patterns
Hands on experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Experience with Amazon Lambda and SQS
Strong troubleshooting experience
At least intermediate English skills
WOULD BE A PLUS:

Ruby and JavaScript familiarity
Experience with Amazon Kinesis
Prometheus and Graphana knowledge

fields.title: Python-developer
fields.description:
What you will do if you work in our Team:

Development of applications with low latency, high availability and performance (low-latency, high-availability, performance).

Integration of elements developed by the front-end team and user-oriented, with server-side logic (front-end component library).

Implementation of information security tools, including the confidentiality of personal data (security and data protection).

Development of backend applications based on carefully thought-out specifications by analysts.

Work with Django backend, for the most part with the Django REST Framework, MySQL is used as a database.
